LanguageData.Balista_Crate.label: 거치식 대형쇠뇌 미설치
LanguageData.Balista_Crate.description: Use this to build 거치식 대형쇠뇌 that fires a the equivalent of a massive 석궁 bolt. Must me manned.
LanguageData.Catapult_Crate.label: 투석기 미설치
LanguageData.Catapult_Crate.description: Use this to build 투석기 that launches explosive/incendiary shells. Must be manned.
LanguageData.M240B_Crate.label: 7.62x51mm M240B MG 미설치
LanguageData.M240B_Crate.description: Use this to build a 7.62x51mm M240B MG, a type of stationary manned 터렛.
LanguageData.MinigunTurret_Crate.label: 7.62x51mm M134 미니건 미설치
LanguageData.MinigunTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a M134 미니건, a type of stationary manned 터렛. Requires 7.62x51mm ammo.
LanguageData.MGTurret_Crate.label: 50BMG M2 Browning MG 미설치
LanguageData.MGTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 50BMG M2 Browning MG, a type of stationary manned 터렛.
LanguageData.KPV_Crate.label: 14.5mm KPV MG 미설치
LanguageData.KPV_Crate.description: Use this to build a 14.5mm KPV MG, a type of stationary manned 터렛. Requires 14.5mm bullets for ammo.
LanguageData.Oerlikonautocannon_Crate.label: 20x102mm Oerlikon 자동포탑 미설치
LanguageData.Oerlikonautocannon_Crate.description: Use this to build an Oerlikon 자동포탑, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 20x102mm for ammo.
LanguageData.VulcanCannon_Crate.label: 20mm Vulcan Cannon 미설치
LanguageData.VulcanCannon_Crate.description: Use this to build a 20mm Vulcan Cannon, a type of stationary manned 터렛. Requires 800 W to function and it uses 20mmx20 Vulcan Bullets for ammo.
LanguageData.Chain_Crate.label: 30x165mm GSh-30 cannon 미설치
LanguageData.Chain_Crate.description: Use this to build a 30x165mm GSh-30 cannon, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 30x165mm for ammo.
LanguageData.Avenger_Crate.label: 30x173mm GAU-8 Avenger 미설치
LanguageData.Avenger_Crate.description: Use this to build a 30x173mm GAU-8 Avenger, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 30x173mm Avenger Shells for ammo.
LanguageData.AGSturret_Crate.label: 30mm AGS-17 미설치
LanguageData.AGSturret_Crate.description: Use this to build a AGS-17, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 30mmx6 GL 터렛 수류탄 for ammo.
LanguageData.AGCturret_Crate.label: 30mm AGS-30 미설치
LanguageData.AGCturret_Crate.description: Use this to build AGS-30, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 30mmx6 GL 터렛 수류탄 for ammo.
LanguageData.Mortar_Crate.label: 81mm 박격포 미설치
LanguageData.Mortar_Crate.description: Use this to build an 박격포 launcher, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 81mm explosive 박격포 shells for ammo.
LanguageData.FlakTurret_Crate.label: 90mm 대공포 터렛 미설치
LanguageData.FlakTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 90mm 대공포 터렛 a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 90mm cannon shells for ammo.
LanguageData.CannonTurret_Crate.label: 120mm Tank cannon 미설치
LanguageData.CannonTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 120mm tank cannon, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 120mm cannon shells for ammo.
LanguageData.HowitzerTurret_Crate.label: 155mm 자주포 미설치
LanguageData.HowitzerTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a 155m 자주포, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 155mm howitzer shells for ammo.
LanguageData.TOW_Crate.label: AT 미사일 BGM-71 TOW 미설치
LanguageData.TOW_Crate.description: Use this to build a light 미사일 시스템 BGM-71 TOW, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses AT 미사일s for ammo.
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Crate.label: AT 미사일 FGM-148 Javelin 미설치
LanguageData.LightMissileSystem_Crate.description: Use this to build a light 미사일 시스템 FGM-148 Javelin, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses AT 미사일 for ammo.
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Crate.label: 130mm Medium 미사일 시스템 미설치
LanguageData.MediumMissileSystem_Crate.description: Use this to build a medium 미사일 시스템, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 130mmx2 미사일s for ammo.
LanguageData.RocketLauncher_Crate.label: 130mm Heavy 미사일 시스템 미설치
LanguageData.RocketLauncher_Crate.description: Use this to build a heavy 미사일 시스템, a type of stationary manned 터렛. It uses 130mmx3 미사일s for ammo.
LanguageData.SentryTurret_Crate.label: .40 Rimfire Sentry light 미설치
LanguageData.SentryTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a sentry light 터렛, a type of stationary automatic 터렛. It requires power to function.
LanguageData.HeavyTurret_Crate.label: 14.5x114mm Sentry heavy 미설치
LanguageData.HeavyTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a sentry heavy 터렛, a type of unmanned automatic 터렛. Requires power to function.
LanguageData.NavalGunTurret_Crate.label: 35mm Sentry naval 미설치
LanguageData.NavalGunTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build 35mm sentry naval 터렛, a type of stationary unmanned 터렛. Requires power to function.
LanguageData.SentryRocketLauncher_Crate.label: AT 미사일 Sentry 로켓 런처 미설치
LanguageData.SentryRocketLauncher_Crate.description: Use this to build a sentry 로켓 런처, a type of stationary unmanned 터렛. Requires power to function.
LanguageData.SentryRocketLauncher_Crate.stuffProps.st: AT 미사일 Sentry 로켓 런처 미설치
LanguageData.SentryBlasterTurret_Crate.label: Sentry blaster 미설치
LanguageData.SentryBlasterTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a sentry blaster 터렛, a type of automatic 터렛s. Requires power to function.
LanguageData.LaserTurret_Crate.label: Laser 포탑 미설치
LanguageData.LaserTurret_Crate.description: Use this to build a laser 터렛, a type of unmanned automatic 터렛. It requires power to function.
